attributes.action: stop all money given to foriegn countries or organisations until our pensioners and the sick are better off.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: charity begins at home, ie in the u.k. We should look after the pensioners, the sick, the needy before giving money to other countries. No cash to palestinians or any other group till we at U.K.PLC are better off.
